title: (43500) Tortosa - 3A Passeig de Joan Moreira
description: It is more apt for campers than anything else. Especially during the day, but we coincidentally parked with an AC of 7 meters. But it is close to everything.

title: (43500) Tortosa - 6 Passeig de Joan Moreira
description: Self-service laundry, in front of Teodoro González Park. Also Blasco spare parts, for maintenance of gas tools.

title: (43500) Tortosa - 1 Urbanitzacio Simpatica
description: Unpaved parking, quiet, 10 'walk from the center. We slept without problems. Silent.

title: (43500) Tortosa - 19 Passeig de Ribera
description: Herringbone car park allowing parking on a car space with cantilever on a wide sidewalk without hindering. Free. Good for visiting Tortosa.

title: (43500) Tortosa - 58 Rambla de Pompeu Fabra
description: Parking without services in the neighborhood of ironworks in Tortosa, near a road but little busy at night, green area with pipican next door, large supermarket 5 minutes, bakery and bars in the area, there is even a launderette nearby, it is called wash-up. To go tortosa center there are about 10 minutes walking by the side of the river.

title: (43500) Tortosa - 68 Camí dels Codonyers
description: Very quiet tarmac parking not very close to everything

title: (43518) Tortosa - Camino Del Pont del Mil·lenari
title_short: (43518) Tortosa - Camino Del Pont del Mil·lenari
description:
Located next to the Ebre River Park and Millennium Bridge. Large space and 5 minutes from downtown.
we just followed signs and found our way here very easily.

title: (43500) Tortosa - 3 Pujada de Tenasses
description: small fountain

title: (43500) Tortosa - 12 Carrer de Ramon Llull
description: Free parking. Asphalted, in front of a park and near the supermarket. Very calm and bright. There are no shadows

title: (43500) Tortosa - s/n Carretera de Roquetes
description: Washing machines and dryers at the Caprabo supermarket. Approach and parking also suitable for large mobile homes

title: (43500) Tortosa - 168 Rambla Felip Pedrell
description: Big free parking near the center city.

title: (43518) Tortosa - 39 Camí del Mig
description: Butane and Propane store service

title: (43518) Tortosa - 38 Carrer Verge de la Petja
title_short: (43518) Tortosa - 38 Carrer Verge de la Petja
description: Very quiet night parking. Mercadona and Aldi to do your lessons. Bike path to go to town.

title: (43520) Roquetes - 122B Urbanització Torre d'en Gil
description: The town of Roquetes has an AC area with 11 places right in the town centre. The area has 8 pads for electricity, filling and draining water, a picnic area in abundant shade, a playground, sports facilities. Roquetes is the gateway to the Parque Natural del Ports, whose headquarters and tourist information point are located 300 meters from the AC. Another tourist attraction is the Via Verda Val de Zafan which extends to 100 from the AC and with access with a cycle path. On the same side of the AC is the Ebro Observatory with more than 100 years of history. The municipal library, the sports center pavilion, the indoor swimming pool and the gymnasium are located in the vicinity of the AC. Roquetes has public transport to access Tortosa, which is the capital of Terres del Ebre and has an important historical complex.

title: (43590) Jesus-Tortosa - 257 Partida Sant Bernabe
description: Greenway parking

title: (43510) Bítem - 22 Carrer del Pou
description: Located between the municipal summer swimming pool and some semi-detached houses. Motorhomes access from Carrer Hereus Gassol (where the Caixa is), the other streets can give serious problems to pass. It is a starting point to go to see the suspension bridges, climb the Montaspre or do enduro routes with the bicycle. Fountain next to the church, containers in the same parking lot. Hard to find bakery. To avoid August, due to the major holidays, heat and mosquitoes.

title: (43527) Els Reguers - 11 Carrer dels Reguers
description: Parking day and night quiet. Seen on the mountain Caro. Without service. Other parking 300m sports area except motocross training (dust). It's necessary to choose.

title: (43527) Els Reguers - Unnamed Road
description: Overnight stay between the Natura Hipica riding school and the public swimming pool. There toilets and showers are available until 19:00. Parking at the playground. Very quiet with a view of the mountains. The sports field is used by the locals until late in the evening. After that very quiet. Great for one night. no service

title: (43591) Aldover - 93 Zn Poligon 22
description: Picnic area on the greenway. Aldover station. In the middle of the orange trees. WC are usually open, two picnic tables and a bar in case we are missing something

title: (43591) Aldover - Carrer de Navarra
description:
2 parking spaces for self-sufficient mobile homes up to 7.5 meters in length and 4.5 t - please register in advance by phone, WhatsApp or email. Unwind under hundred-year-old olive trees and carob trees. Camping behavior welcome. Fenced, quiet and spacious finca. On top of Aldover hill with direct access to the Via Verde, the railway route. Magnificent views of the mountains of the Els Ports Natural Park, which offers many opportunities for hiking, climbing and remarkable biodiversity. Dogs allowed on a leash.
Toilet emptying possible without paper.

name: Aldoverde
title: (43591) Aldoverde
description:
Please contact us before arrival, also at short notice, so that we can unlock the gate and provide water and electricity if necessary.

View over and to the Els Ports nature park and direct view of the Barranc de la Conca gorge with the wonderful sound of the birds.
Completely concrete access road and easy access even in heavy rain.

- El Toll Blue (15 mins)
- hot springs (30 min)
- Sea (30 min)
- Bot (wine, 25 min).

Completely fenced, water and electricity available.
We speak English, German, Spanish, Russian and Ukrainian.

name: Rust, ruimte, fantastisch uitzicht/zeezicht, midden in de natuur
title: (43500) Rust, ruimte, fantastisch uitzicht/zeezicht, midden in de natuur
title_short: (43500) Rust, ruimte, fantastisch uitzicht/zeezicht, midden in de natuur
description: Unique and amazing place, very quiet and in the middle of nature. From this beautiful finca (located at ~350 meters above sea level) with several hundred old olive trees you have a fantastic view of the fishing village of L'Ampolla, the Ebro delta, the mountains of Montsia and the Mediterranean Sea. Ideal for lovers of peace and nature. I offer intuitive and holistic outdoor massages, meditations and mindful walks. The nearest towns (L'Ampolla, El Perelló, Camarles and Tortosa) are about 25 to 35 minutes away by car. Here you will find various restaurants, supermarkets and places of interest. NB: The last part of the road to our finca is quite steep and has some bends. Passenger cars and vans (eg VW Transporter and Mercedes Sprinter) can easily park here. With a motorhome this can be a challenge. Please contact us in advance by telephone or via Whatsapp. Tatiana

address.street: Cami de la font de la gracia

title: (43870) Amposta -
description: Cool place for a picnic

title: (43592) Xerta - C-12
description: Picnic area with 4 tables.

title: (43896) La Aldea - Autopista del Mediterráneo
description: Water point with flexible hose attached to a tire inflation terminal! Unlimited water ... enjoy

title: (43528) Alfara de Carles - 5 Carrer Major
description: Penyaflor via ferrata car park. Near a road and a poultry farm. There is not much noise at night.

title: (43592) Cherta - C-12
description: Nice parking space under old trees with two barbecue areas and some stone tables and benches. Great view of the river and the landscaped canal. Street noise could be heard, but not very loud. Some parking spaces are only accessible up to a maximum of 220 due to the trees, some are in between, which makes larger vehicles possible.

title: (43896) L'Aldea -
description: Perfect service station for filling up with water, emptying gray and black water, free parking next to trucks, large parking lot and picnic area.

title: (43527) Els Reguers - Unnamed Road
description: Fantastic and isolated place, road for vans, not motorhome, narrow. Asphalt most part except the last km

title: (43592) Xerta - 60 Carrer Angel
description:
Nice long car park between nice big river and canal on hard ground with loose stones and dirt 
Lots of space and shade picnic tables and benches , shower , toilet, and  drinking water available 
Great place for fishing
Small local shop in 3min walking distance (need to check the opening hours) also small playground next to the shop approximately 10 min walk to city center with few shops  pharmacy and bars swimming pool maybe 15 min walking distance entry 2 or 3€ per adult there is food and drink bar inside 
Despite signs that said "not swiming in canal," lots of people , especially locals, do swim there
 just need to be careful with currens clean water at canal and river
may not be suitable for big motor homes. The manoeuvre may be hard 
We have stayed for 2 days nice, mainly quite place 
I definitely recommend it

title: (43592) Xerta - 4 Carrer Ebre
description: Recreation and picnic area between the Ebro and the canal, 2 minutes from the town of Xerta. A very refreshing stop.

title: (43528) Alfara de Carles - Unnamed Road
description:
In the middle of a natural park. Starting point of a hike to a beautiful gorge swimming spot (Toll Bleu 2km) but also smaller pools directly at the spot. The last stretch of the road is not paved but we had no issue with access with our van. 
very quite and peaceful in the middle of nature.

title: (43511) Tivenys - 11 Avinguda Generalitat
description: Large car park next to river and bar which overlooks river, there is a water tap next to bar, need to ask bar owner to use

title: (43896) L'Aldea - N-340a
description: Next to the Ap7. Place enabled to have Picnic. Numerous tables and barbecues. It is very spacious and super quiet. We just stopped to eat. We liked it a lot!

title: (43896) L'Aldea - 5 Raval de Leche
description: The area has 35 parking spaces, water supply, gray and black water drainage, lighting and is located on the same side of Parque de la Vía, behind the Tourist Information Office, next to the city center and close to shops. the network of bike paths and greenways with direct access to the Camino de la Ermita, one of the access routes to the Delta. The City Council has newly created some SP 150 m from the current area.   No toilets

title: (43592) Xerta - 8 Avinguda de l'Estació
description: Old train station right next to the greenway of the Val de Zafán, transformed into bike rental and transfers on the greenway and kayaks on the Ebro river. Picnic area with fountain and children's play area. Quiet area at night and day. Possibility of parking under the pines.

title: (43570) Santa Bàrbara -
description: Ruine of a mill, adapted to rest.

title: (43870) Amposta - 38 Carrer Sant Joan
description: Public parking without any service, but it is allowed to spend the night. Next to the suspension bridge of Amposta, on the banks of the Ebro river. Being so central, it has the problem of noise because cars pass by at night.

title: (43593) Paüls - Unnamed Road
description: Shaded picnic area with tables and two water fountains. Starting point of mountain routes. There is a refuge 5 minutes away that is managed by the town hall. Small parking, fit 5-6 vehicles. Complicated access road for motorhomes. We have had a quiet night.

title: (43870) Tarragona - 4 Carrer Berlín
description: Inexpensive gas station, where you can also drink water

title: (43870) Amposta - 7E Carrer de França
description: Nice tarred parking adjacent to lots of sports facilities and a school. Quiet enough at night. No services but a good overnight stop and easy access to the freeways.

title: (43592) Xerta - 270 C-12
description: Various car parks on both sides of the road in the surroundings of the Assut de Xerta. Interesting area to visit.

title: (43896) L'Aldea - Partida la Ermita
description: Big parking lot between cemetery, watchtower and church. Shaded, a drinkable water tap, a small area for kids, a good spot to spend nights...

title: (43894) Camarles - 200 Passeig Venta Nova
description: Parking of the Interpretation Center of l'Arroz: large esplanade of land ideal for visiting. The perfect guide Elias with a lot of passion for rice. Very interesting! Next to the Torre de la Granadella: private tower. You cannot stay overnight.

title: (43870) Amposta - 3B Carrer Sebastià Juan Arbó
description: Welcome to the new Amposta motorhome area! This is a recently created area and the emptying/filling of sewage is provisional (the work will be carried out shortly). Located next to the sports area, swimming pool and a large playground, the Ebre delta is the perfect place for you to enjoy your family holidays. With a distance of only 500 meters to the center, 650 meters from a laundry, 500 meters from the municipal swimming pool that has an indoor and outdoor pool. You will have easy access to shops, restaurants and all the amenities that the city has to offer. It has water filling, black / gray and light emptying. Until August 20 there are local festivals with many acts for large and small, the area is close to the concert area and noise can disturb some nights during these days. Enjoy the parties that are all invited.

title: (43592) Xerta -
description: Open spot directly at the water. no services but good access to the river. can be reached by car or van. Big enough for several vehicles (5-6). very calm.

title: (43870) Amposta - 119 Carrer Sant Cristòfol
description: Laundromat very clean parking nearby

title: (43870) Amposta - 20 TV-3405
description: Parking near the rio Ebro and a landscaped trail. possibility to spend the night because no restriction or limit of height or simply like us for a picnic!

title: (43870) Amposta - 1 Carrer Sant Cristòfol
description: Parking in Eroski car park, no restrictions. runs right next to the N340 so great stop off. no amenities but you have a small cheap (ish) self service petrol station that also has water. toilets in Eroski supermarket. nice bar in park xiribecs 50m up the road.

title: (43894) Camarles - TV3409
description: In front of the football stadium, we spent the night without problem, the police round told us nothing, flat land.

title: (43870) Amposta - 210 Avinguda de la Ràpita
description: Just behind the garage is a large open area with 1 big tree...I stayed underneath all night, nobody said a word....very convenient for fuel, gas , supplies...theres a bit of plant noise from a factory but it's nothing to worry about, great stop if you have a dog.

title: (43894) Camarles - 7 Carrer Cinquanta-cinc
description: Great quiet large parking lot at the information. There are also fixed benches with tables and some grills that you can use with. Information and maps are available at the tourist office, waste containers are available. There is even a water crane.

title: (43528) Alfara de Carles -
description:
We are a sustainable fish center located in the magnificent Els Ports Natural Park. We have an area for motorhomes, caravans and camping between wooded areas where you can disconnect in a quiet place surrounded by nature.

Likewise, it is a private property that offers the security of being fenced and that, in addition, gives you the opportunity to enjoy trout fishing, a picnic area with barbecues to cook fresh fish, natural mini-golf, games for the little ones ( and not so small), access to official park routes...

It is essential to make a prior reservation (search our contact on Google)

The AiguaNatura dels Ports team awaits you! And the horse, the pony, the sheep, the cats, the fish, and hundreds of wild birds...

name: Area autocaravanas Camarles
title: (43894) Area autocaravanas Camarles
description: It is on the outskirts of town where there are supermarkets. next to the tourist office there is some shade and tables and barbecues. Perfect to start visiting the Delta As it is inaugurated, I will update more information

title: (43894) Camarles - 27 Carrer Vint-i-set
description: Lo Safarix laundry 500 meters from the motorhome area

title: (43500) Tortosa -
description: Only small camper -little off road-

title: (43527) - 3 Partida los Puertos
description: Quiet place in nature. parking to attack the climb of Caro (walk obviously 4 km). 1000 m above sea level it must not be too cold, other possible locations.

title: (43870) Amposta - TV-3405
description: Small parking along the Ebre where we spent the night without problems in April. no convenience. only mountain bikers and walkers in the early hours. Very calm night.

title: (43895) L'Ampolla -
description: Welcome to Finca Ermita, a 10 hectare olive grove, olive, almond and carob trees. In an exceptional site, view of the delta. Excellent welcome to motorhomes Sale of 1st quality natural olive oil. Tel before coming or WhatsApp

title: (43528) Alfara de Carles -
description: Not recommended for large motorhomes as the route is narrow and steep, perfect for vans. Nice place with a stunning view. Close to the small hermitage and El Toscar hiking trails. Trash cans and picnic tables.

title: (43580) Deltebre - Carrer Reis Catòlics
description: Parking at the start of the stroll by the river. Quiet, a few mosquitoes. Provide earplugs in windy conditions. Nice view in the morning.

title: (43895) L'Ampolla - 15 Carrer Poligono 38
description: Small gas station with possibility of refilling your water tank

title: (43520) Roquetes - 12 Cami 71 Cm Ports
description: Mirador del Monte Caro. Spectacular views of the Ebro Delta. With good visibility you can see Mallorca and the snow-covered Maladetas in winter. The access road to the viewpoint, from the detour, does not allow crossings and the width is only one vehicle. On the other hand, from the plain the road is suitable for double circulation. The parking is small, only a few cars fit.

title: (43895) L'Ampolla - 1 Avinguda de l'Ampolla
description: Small flat parking near the sea. Allegedly forbidden for campers at night. We had lunch there. No services. The price of the fine seems huge!

name: Camping Ampolla Playa
title: (43895) Camping Ampolla Playa
description: Good pitch, well maintained, new plumbing, restaurant with sea view. Only a quiet road separates the beach from the campsite, from some pitches you can see the sea. The site is beautifully landscaped with palm trees and other plants, the pitches are semi-shaded and large. Swimming pool, tennis court, small football field. The town of L'Ampolla can be reached on foot or by bike. In high season, noise from the nearby nightclub may affect.

title: (43895) Tarragona -
description: Where the palm trees are there is a promenade and next is the sea. A wide place, dirt floor. There are usually always motorhomes and cars, there is a lot of movement of people walking, so it gives the feeling of security. Three steps from the sea, next to a campsite. In case there is no space in the car park, there are more car parks on the road.

title: (43895) L'Ampolla - 13D Zn Fava
description: Parking along beach front with no timing or parking restrictions showing. On main road so probably a little noisy to stop at night.

title: (43527) Tortosa - 15 Partida los Puertos
description: Under large trees, close to houses but very quiet

title: (43895) L'Ampolla - Carrer Sagunto
description: Great location, no service, close to the sea and the promenade, near the city center

title: (43527) - 19 Partida los Puertos
description: Terraced parking with capacity for 6 campers or AC petites. Hem passat la nit sense problems. A prop del Caro refuge and restaurant El Port. Proper routes and ascents to Mont-Caro.

title: (43870) Amposta - 5 Partida Carlet
description: Private family camper farm that offers their space to share their way of life, site for two motorhomes, with a play area for children, animals (chickens, dogs, kittens) and an eco-garden, picnic area. It has a small cabin where there is a shower (not hot water) and a bathroom. There is hot water in the outdoor shower. Ideal for families with children. Possibility of buying organic seasonal vegetables and organic eggs if available. They also offer the possibility of washing clothes

title: (43512) Benifallet - Unnamed Road
description: Parking of the caves of Meravelles. It is a car park but call us to ask if we could go park with 7m AC and they said yes, as long as there is space. It was mid week and low season and we had no problems. Ask for an appointment. Limited person entry. Small caves but a MERAVELLA of caves!

title: (43895) L'Ampolla - Carrer Carreter
description: Large municipal park without prohibition for motorhomes, local bom to spend the night near the beach.

title: (43514) Mas de Barberans - 10 Travesera 4ª de l'Avinguda Catalunya
title_short: (43514) Mas de Barberans - 10 Travesera 4ª de l'Avinguda Catalunya
description: Quiet and relaxing place near Mas de Barberans where you will find a fountain, tables and 4 parking spaces. There is no electricity or water drainage. There is good shade and it is wonderful. In front is a pond with ducks and geese. Perfect place to rest and visit the area!

title: (43895) L'Ampolla - Unnamed Road
description: Parking with good views without services

title: (43895) L'Ampolla - 8 Carrer carreter
description: About 20 public parking spaces suitable for campers up to 5m. Overlooking a roundabout below, wide view. Clean and not too loud.

title: (43519) El Perelló - 264 Zn Diseminats
description: A calm place among olive and almond trees. The spots are near a little farm house where Fran lives and close enough so that he can provide you with some needs you may have, Ask him and he ll show you. Great stop for Nice starry nights. There is a place to buy organic vegetables 200 meters away and also an organic vinyard about 1km away. there s plenty to explore around this area, beach at 8km, River Delta 20km, Caves..Water and organic waste bin can be provided.Wifi is available mear the house area. Electric/shower use/laundry use is optional. Look for the classic green VW Van to know you have arrived.

title: (43895) L'Ampolla - 1-17 Avenida de la Generalitat
description: Truck parking (3 places) next to the Ebro park. Residential area but next to the highway. Easy access. We did not spend the night but there is no sign that prevents overnight stays. Ideal for stop on the road.

title: (43593) Paüls - N-230b
description: Source with drinking water

title: (43593) Paüls - 25 Carrer Sant Roc
description: Follow the TV-3541 road and do not take the shortcut that takes us through the municipal swimming pool (steep climb) and follow the road to Sant Roc until the detour to the right that the GPS will mark us. There is a fountain inside the playground. It is a good place for hiking trips, within the core of the town you cannot access vehicles longer than 6m, so it is not worth going up with the vehicle. Someone put a sign on some billboards in front of an orchard, forbidding parking, we stayed for two days and people parked anyway. It would be necessary to call the town hall to find out the "official" of the signs. We park and spend the night on the side, no problem. It is worth going up to the viewpoint. There is a bar and a bakery.

title: (43519) El Perelló -
description: Regenerative and spiritual shamanic farm Terra de Burgans 15 minutes from the beach and close to mountain roads, a quiet place to relax and spend the night.

title: (43593) Paüls - 1 Diseminado Diseminats
description: Parking area next to the cemetery or the town, without services, with shade.

title: (43580) Deltebre - Carrer Amposta
description: Rest area with parking, information stand

title: (43895) L'Ampolla - 14 Zn Ligallo Fornos
description: Area next to a pavilion shaded by pine trees. A nice secluded and quiet place. We ate in the place but we did not spend the night, although it is possible.

title: (43870) Amposta - Unnamed Road
description: Small car park to visit this natural park. The park is worth it.

title: (43580) Deltebre -
description: Isolated car park. in the middle of nothing. authorized and quiet

title: (43895) L'Ampolla - 1B Avinguda Sant Joan
description: Parking several places near a few houses We had a very quiet night near the railway but no train at night I recommend

title: (43512) Benifallet - TV-3021
description: Seaside of Cardó. Old abandoned Spa, located in the middle of the Serra de Cardó. Tranquility assured. The village is about 8 km. Excellent point of view and possibility of hiking or mountain biking.

title: (43895) L'Ampolla - 4 Carrer Acantilats
description: The place is spectacular, one of those unique places, only motorhome or small motorhome, an idyllic and very quiet place for 1, very quiet area, near the city in a small cozy cove ideal for diving snorkeling and being with children. From there, a beautiful road along the coast begins not to be missed. If you are in the area and going by motorhome or small motorhome, I would go to this place without hesitation (if it's free).

title: (43580) Deltebre - 18 Carrer Reis Catòlics
description: Picnic area with shade and a fountain.

title: (43512) Benifallet - TV-3021
description: The site is next to the road, in a viewpoint, but no car passes because the road goes to the abandoned Cardó spa. We spent the night in a recommended place here at park4night but a security guard came to check us out at 7 in the morning. He has told us that where we are now we can stay. The site is not level but the views and silence are spectacular.

title: (43895) L'Ampolla - 1 Carrer Rave de Mar
description: A very quiet place, in a villas area by the sea. Overnight stay prohibited.

title: (43513) Rasquera - Unnamed Road
description: Nice place in the mountains

title: (43895) Camarles/L'Ampolla - 1029 Diseminado Diseminats
description: Natural area Lo Gorelo. Parking for about 10 vehicles, without facilities, just a garbage. Very quiet place overlooking the delta.

title: (43895) L'Ampolla - 31 Carrer Cala Maria
description: Directly on the beach out of season. Parking just behind the ground in season. Quite a few walkers, but a beautiful cove in a peaceful location. Out of season you are alone at the water's edge. On the other hand, the access road is quite perious, with some subsidence, large holes and stones with the heavy rainy days. The beach is sandy with some pebbles. Very passable in 4x4, but not at all without. To access it, you have to walk along a fence, you have the impression of going into a house but the path goes down to the beach.

title: (43516) Godall - Unnamed Road
description: Very quiet place, beautiful views and perfect for spending a few quiet nights.

title: (43877) Sant Jaume d'Enveja - 53 Carrer de Sant Cristòfol
title_short: (43877) Sant Jaume d'Enveja - 53 Carrer de Sant Cristòfol
description: Super quiet site next to the Ebro river. No services. Greenway parking. Small parking spots, 6m max.

title: (43877) Balada - 20 Carrer de Sant Cristòfol
description: Drinking water tap in the playground

title: (43519) El Perelló - Ermita de Sant Cristofol
title_short: (43519) El Perelló - Ermita de Sant Cristofol
description: It is the recreational area of the Ermita de Sant Cristofol and is on the outskirts of El Perelló.

title: (43520) - El Mas de Barró
description: Recreation in the middle of the mountain region. The way there is about 6km long. Tarred at the beginning, the rest is gravel. Four-wheel drive is not absolutely necessary.

title: (43580) Deltebre - 12 Carrer Aube
description: We slept peacefully on the banks of the Ebro, playground, slalom skate track, neighborhood picnic with barbecue, waste source container and drinking water. Forbidden at night.

title: (43512) Benifallet - 12 Carrer Marcel·lí Domingo
description: Fill up the well with water

title: (43512) Benifallet - 14 Passatge de l'Ebre
description:
At the house of the fire brigade there is a water hose with drinking water.
100l for an unbelievable 20 cents!

title: (43580) Deltebre -
description: Splendid place in the lagoons, by the sea, with a view of the mountains. Very calm. Sunset and birdsong. BE CAREFUL many very voracious mosquitoes, especially in the evening.

title: (43519) El Perelló - 3 Carrer del Joc
description: location at the end of a dead end road shelter from the wind, sun ☀️ in the morning at sunrise, very quiet at night....accessible for all vehicles..

title: (43512) Benifallet - 33 Carrer Alfonso
description: Walk along the Ebro River in Benifallet, located in the parking area near the old wash houses. quiet and pleasant place

title: (43512) Benifallet - 3 T-301
description: You just have to enter the Benifall river and this little corner a stone's throw from the river to swim. To visit the village and spend the night without any problem.

title: (43519) El Perelló - 21 Carrer Zona Aliga
description: Parking on the Esplanade without service for motorhomes maximum 24 hours near the beach. only you can't park tables, chairs...! That's why they activated it in the parking lot below MULTAN. Respect so that we can continue to have a parking space. Dog beach nearby, bar, walkway. water tap at the stand.

title: (43580) Deltebre - Unnamed Road
description: At the end of a small track, next to the port, natural parking area. 2 vehicles maximum. Great view. No services.

title: (43596) - 21 Diseminado Diseminats
description: Quiet place on the banks of the river. Several campers sleeping. Starting point for mountain biking and hiking.

title: (43580) Deltebre - Unnamed Road
description: Parking near the fishing port, the pumping station is a bit noisy. no ban, excellent starting point for visiting the Ebro delta park.

title: (43580) Deltebre -
description: On the banks of the Elbre on the right bank with a magnificent view of the bridge (lit at night). A walking path above for joggers and bicycles. A few passages of fishermen, very quiet night, but like everywhere in this region mosquitoes and garbage cans!!!!

name: Camping Mas dels Ateus del Port
title: (43596) Camping Mas dels Ateus del Port
title_short: (43596) Camping Mas dels Ateus del Port
description: CLOSED IN AUGUST // Camping area controlled by Ateus. Area managed by Aj. De Horta S. Joan, with toilets, sinks, (cold) showers, barbecue area and waste bins. Wooded pitches with grass and leveled. They begin to collect municipal fees daily. Absolute tranquility in the heart of the park.

title: (43580) Deltebre - 8 Carrer Verge del Carme
description: V/E station, fresh water connection - structurally quite correct but badly maintained, very neglected. payable with EC card or cash, then the barrier opens. Fresh water available without restriction.

title: (43580) Deltebre - 36 Carrer Verge del Carme
description: Nice motorhome area on the river and on the Deltebre side. Supply and disposal (toilet, fresh and gray water) 100 meters in front of the square with its own barrier and machines.

title: (43519) Perelló-Mar -
description: Cala Moros parking lot! Small, with shadows, plain enough! You can hear the noise of the sea and unfortunately also that of the ap7

title: (43877) Sant Jaume d'Enveja - 31 Partida Mas Roig
title_short: (43877) Sant Jaume d'Enveja - 31 Partida Mas Roig
description: Asphalted pier next to the ebro river

title: (43559) Ulldecona -
description:
This place is a hidden secret for nature lovers who don't want to camp illegally . It belongs to Birgitt who owns a large area here and welcomes every kind of camper. She emigrated a long time ago from Germany and is living in her private paradise. She doesn't offer anything except for water. When I arrived, Birgit asked me to share this place here after I told her about Park4Nite because she is not looking for mainstream campers but wants to make this place available.

If you're coming from South on the TV - 3314 , you turn left on cami rural municipal (a bridge) then you turn left instantly after you cross the bridge. After 20 meters you turn right and then follow a dusty and narrow gravel road for roughly 800 meters, until  you reach the first Finca on the right. Contact Birgitt at least one day before and she will be more than happy to welcome you too 
She says that she welcomes motorhomes to but I have my doubts that anything bigger than a Mercedes Viano would make it on the  gravel road ...

title: (43877) Sant Jaume d'Enveja - 4 Partida Ribes
description: Public parking by the river, il.luminat i asfaltat. At the edge of a road suitable for walking along the river. Very calm.

title: (43580) Deltebre - 27 Avinguda Generalitat
description: There is a water and air fill station on the left side of the petrol station Esclat Oil.

title: (43877) Sant Jaume d'Enveja - 28 Passeig de la Segregació
title_short: (43877) Sant Jaume d'Enveja - 28 Passeig de la Segregació
description: A large parking lot exclusively for motorhomes. No demarcated places. Sandy surface. Because gray and black water can also be discharged and fresh water can be tapped, this looks more like a free aire. The service area is not to the left past the entrance, where there is a sign that you need a ticket. The care is at the back right and free. No card or token needed. There is room for at least 30 campers. The police regularly drive around the site, it seems standard control round. They look around and drive on. Tables and chairs are tolerated.

title: (43580) Deltebre - 36 Avinguda de les Goles de l'Ebre
title_short: (43580) Deltebre - 36 Avinguda de les Goles de l'Ebre
description: Launderette, Self Service. 4 washing machines with 11 kg, 14 kg and 18 kg including detergent and fabric softener. 3 dryers of 18 kg, 5 min or 10 min. 1 large folding table. Seating also for small children. Everything very clean. Cash only, machine changes banknotes into coins. There are enough parking spaces on the street up to a vehicle width of approx. 2.20 m.

address.street: 36 Avinguda de les Goles de l'Ebre

description: Aparcament per fer l'excursió dels Estrets d'Arnes. Hi has the possibility of bany al Toll Blau, 2km from l'aparcament.

title: (43550) Ulldecona - Bassa de les Ermites
description: Hermitage of Pietat Ulldecona. Sports climbing area with free parking. daytime utilities and bar.

title: (43595) Prat de Comte - Unnamed Road

title_short: (43877) Sant Jaume d'Enveja - 48 Avinguda de Mallorca

title: (43860) L'Ametlla de Mar - Urbanització Àliga
description: Parking area to go down to the beach. There is always room because it is a large esplanade with shadows if you arrive early. During the day it fills up. You can not stay overnight, prohibition to park from midnight to 7 am.

title: (43596) Horta de Sant Joan - Unnamed Road
title_short: (43596) Horta de Sant Joan - Unnamed Road
description: A breathtaking view of the Roques de Benet, from a small car park in the middle of olive groves, at the edge of a very quiet road.

title: () Amposta - Carrer Ebre
description: Flat location, pretty away from everything. Need password for wifi. Okay for a night. Nice walking, see flamingos migration. Near restaurant, bathroom during day. Really busy and heavily used by other campers. Expect 40  campers. !!! Fresh water and dumping only from 9 am to 1 pm !!!

title: (43540) Sant Carles de la Ràpita - 0 Carrer Doctor Torné
title_short: (43540) Sant Carles de la Ràpita - 0 Carrer Doctor Torné
description: Tarmac parking, slightly sloping next to the football field. A little passage.

title: (43594) El Pinell de Brai - Via Verda
title_short: (43594) El Pinell de Brai - Via Verda
description: It is an abandoned train station, next to the green cycle track. A small park for children. The parking is flat and wide. The cycle track is long, with the main parts being Alcañiz-Tortosa. No services at all, just parking.

title: (43860) L'Ametlla de Mar - 22 Partida els Trossos
title_short: (43860) L'Ametlla de Mar - 22 Partida els Trossos
description: Free water tap only at filling station.

title: (43595) Prat de Comte - T-333
description: Municipal car park in Prat de Comte, next to the Parc Natural dels Ports visitor center, on the T-333 road. The center can be visited, according to schedule. They offer exhibition visits and information on routes through the Park. Outside the center are two picnic tables, a fountain, and wastebaskets. In the town of Prat de Comte there is a grocery store, bar and restaurants, as well as the possibility of bathing in the municipal swimming pool. Ideal to start cycling routes through the greenway, the route to Fontcalda and through the Natural Park dels Ports.

title: (43595) Prat de Comte - 30 T-361
description: Picnic area with barbecues, playground for children, football pitch and swimming pool and land for parking nearby.

title: (43597) Arnes - Unnamed Road
description: "Parking" at the entrance of the gorge. Tarred road. End of a dead end. 2 places for small campers, relatively flat. Gorge and Badegumpen sensational. Of course no service.

title: (43595) Prat de Comte - 24 Carrer Verge de la Fontcalda
title_short: (43595) Prat de Comte - 24 Carrer Verge de la Fontcalda
description: Very nice, designated large parking space on the edge of a quiet village, with supply and disposal, no electricity. If you like nature, like hiking, or would like to ride a bike on a former railway line, this is the place for you.

title: (43597) Arnes - Unnamed Road
description: Small spot on the side of the road for a single vehicle, before reaching the two parking lots ahead. Direct views of the mountains. Very quiet place, a few cars passed. It is possible that it is part of the olive grove, but nobody came to say anything to us.

title: (43877) Sant Jaume d'Enveja - 30 Carrer de Sant Jordi
title_short: (43877) Sant Jaume d'Enveja - 30 Carrer de Sant Jordi
description: Small car park on the banks of the Ebro. We have stopped to eat because it was one of the few places with shade. quiet place during the day.

title: (43597) Arnes - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet parking between almond fields and the mountains. We spend a quiet peaceful night under the stars with nice sunrise and sunset colours. From here you can walk or bike to Toll Blau in Els Estrets river. (1.2km) The road to/from Arnes is paved and narrow, the road from Horta San Joan, following the sign left to "els Ports" is gravel road and a bit wider. The road from here to Toll Blau pool was to small and curvy for the 6.20m / 3.20m high van that my mother is driving. Also this parking is more even and greener than the one right next to Toll Blau and the river.

title: (43860) L'Ametlla de Mar - 13 Partida Santes Creus
title_short: (43860) L'Ametlla de Mar - 13 Partida Santes Creus
description: Quiet flat parking lot in the field for access to the beach (creek). Little coastal hike. There is a sign that you can not park from 00 to 7 am

title: (43513) Rasquera - 15 Carrer Sant Domingo
description: Spectacular picnic area, with the best views of the Ribera d'Ebre region, from where you can see it all. There is a hermitage, tables and benches under the trees; good shadow The town, Rasquera, has a complete and useful supermarket (tobacconist included).

title: (43540) La Ràpita - 58 Avinguda Constitució
description: Nice and clean the other laundry down the road is closed

description: “Open Blue” laundry service. Open until 10 p.m.

title: (43513) Rasquera - 14 Carrer del Parral
description: Great flat vantage point with plenty of room to park. very nice place .

title: (43540) La Ràpita - 184 Carrer Sant Isidre
description: Laundromat with fair prices

title: (43860) L'Ametlla de Mar - 15 Partida Santes Creus
title_short: (43860) L'Ametlla de Mar - 15 Partida Santes Creus
description: Place very close to the beach. Probabily closed during summer. Small acess. Enough for small vans or cars with rooftents.

title: (43540) La Ràpita -
description: public toilet

name: Camping l’Almetlla
title: (43860) Camping l’Almetlla
description: The reception staff are very friendly and speak French. They have a grocery store, a restaurant and a magnificent swimming pool (usable from April to September). The sanitary facilities are clean, spacious and heated in winter (washing machine and dryer). There is direct access to the beach and a wonderful walk along the cliffs. The pitches are spacious and delimited by small hedges. The emptying and filling of water is done outside and is free.

title: (43785) Bot - 6-4 TV-3301
description: It is a fairly quiet area next to a good road with little traffic.

title: (43596) Horta de San Juan -
description: Aparcament per deixar l'ac aprop of the Muntanya de Sta. Barbara and be able to bid to the Monestir i fer excursions. Accès just if you see a cotxe in contraction direction.

title: (43549) Poble Nou - 27 Ronda dels Pins
description: Parking next to a park (there are also parked cars), there is also room for motorhomes, without services but we found this place very quiet and perfect for children and dogs with lots of space and surrounded by rice paddies

title: (43594) El Pinell de Brai - 25 Carrer de la Carretera
title_short: (43594) El Pinell de Brai - 25 Carrer de la Carretera
description: Land parking next to the village cooperative. There is no service, but a small public fountain.

title: (43549) Poble Nou - 3 Plaça del Jardí
description: Xanascat - Alberg Encanyissada Shower service available for 2.5 euros

title: (43549) Poble Nou - 6 Ronda Fortalesa
description: They have enabled a space to stay overnight for free. An esplanade with capacity for 40-50 .. There are some cans to fill the water tank (not drinkable) free of charge. Good place to spend the night. There is no more service.

title: (43595) Prat de Comte - 1 T-361
description: The parking is Estació Prat del Compte. On the same greenway. If you drive a very large camper, it is better to leave it here and go to the Fontcalda on foot or by bike. Ideal place to access the greenway

title: () Arnes - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful and quiet place next to the Toll del Vidre with pools to bathe. Little GPS coverage, better go to Vilar Rural d'Arnes and from there it is very well indicated! There is a very good source at the beginning of the road, in the pools there is another but little water came out. Asphalt road that turns into dirt with some small but with a Mercedes Sprinter 316 of 5.5m long I did it without problems

title: (43595) Gandesa - Via Verdes Baix Ebre
description: Parking of the interpretive area of the Vall de Jepa. To access it, you must go along the forest track, going down to the left of the old Prat de Comte train station.

title: (43785) Bot - 4 TV-3301
description: A small parking place just as the small road turns 90 degrees... Wonderful and unspoiled view of the surroundings! Not sure if it’s allowed to stay the night, and it’s ONLY suited for camper vans (California etc.) because of the narrow mountain road going here.

title: (43594) El Pinell de Brai - 13 Carrer de l'Estadi
title_short: (43594) El Pinell de Brai - 13 Carrer de l'Estadi
description: Municipal camping area for all types of vehicles and tendes. Disposa de tots els serveis: aigua i llum; download gray and black water; module of sanitaris with dutxes d'aigua heats, piques for renting plats and safarejos; barbecues and tables with bancs; ombra; quiet molt. On the coast of the soccer camp and the municipal swimming pool and touching the center of the town. An excel·lent lloc.

title: (43549) Poble Nou - 15 Ronda del Mar
description: Picnic area, with 3 tables and playground. Next to the town of Poblenou with various services. Street parking without height limit or free parking but with height limit. At the beginning of March without space problem, at other times I could not say.

title: (43594) El Pinell de Brai - 12 Carrer de la Constitucio
title_short: (43594) El Pinell de Brai - 12 Carrer de la Constitucio
description: Small esplanade for 1 or 2 camper vans of less than 7 meters. Stony path to get there. Beautiful 360 degree point of view!

title: (43540) La Ràpita - Unnamed Road
description: You can park along the gravel driveway and watch the flamingos in the water right on the shore. Only a few fishermen come here during the day.

title: (43549) Poble Nou - 23 Ronda del Mar
description: Football stadium car park. The only place where it is possible to spend the night because prohibition sign in the whole village. Quiet, flat with a bike circuit on site.

title: (43596) Horta de Sant Joan - 8 Avinguda de la Piscina
title_short: (43596) Horta de Sant Joan - 8 Avinguda de la Piscina
description: Parking located next to the pool

title: (43594) El Pinell de Brai - N-230c
description: Rest area Possibility 2 or 3 AC in parking. Ideal place to make a stop. It seems calm. Fountain, children's games, tables to eat and a small lake.

title: (43596) Horta de Sant Joan - 23 Carrer Dedicat al Medi Natural
title_short: (43596) Horta de Sant Joan - 23 Carrer Dedicat al Medi Natural
description:
Normal parking on the edge of the village. Nice and quiet in winter. From there you can borrow bikes for the disused old railway line from the nearby bike shop. Awesome bike path. It's definitely a great day program.

Paddle court
Evening lighting
trash cans
Gray water drain
Water point

title: (43596) Horta de Sant Joan -
description: HIPPYATRICO is located in Horta de Sant Joan (Tarragona) in front of the ports of Tortosa Baseit, specifically in front of Montsagre and Santa Barbara. Hippyatrico as the words say hipp and atrico ... geriatric hippie ... based on a non-profit camping area for people over 40 years old, minors may attend as guests ... hippyatrico is a registered trademark .. Do yoga, meditation, hiking, climbing, visit the greenway, the Picasso museum, enjoy the rivers, be happy hippyatrico Facebook group

title: (43596) Horta de Sant Joan - Unnamed Road
title_short: (43596) Horta de Sant Joan - Unnamed Road
description: Les Olles. Perfect place to spend the night. Very quiet and easily accessible. It is a typical place to bathe in summer, known by the inhabitants of the area. 4 km from the Horta de Sant Joan following the path of the convent and then towards Les Olles. There is a small parking lot very flat. To get to the end of the parking lot you have to go with 4x4, high van or short and high motorhome. We acceded to the place with high motorhome, about 35 cm.

title: (43860) L'Estany - 27A Urbanització Port Estany
description: At the entrance to the port of Estany, not on the ledge that spoils the landscape. Day parking between 15/04 and 15/09. There is no indication of a ban the rest of the year. Under the pines, relatively quiet at night, despite the noise of the national or the train, sheltered from the wind. Wake up to the sea. Shower still available at the beach.

title: (43785) Bot -
description: Space next to a stream with forest and crops. Suitable for small and medium motorhomes. In the immediate vicinity of the "Les Olles" bathing area with deep pools.

title: (43860) Roques Daurades - 4P Lloc Urbanitzacio Rocas Doradas
title_short: (43860) Roques Daurades - 4P Lloc Urbanitzacio Rocas Doradas
description: Parking in urbanization, without services, you can spend the night, there are no prohibition signs. The parking lot on the playa de l'estany is forbidden to park from 0am to 7am and motorhomes are forbidden both to park and stay overnight.

title: (43580) Deltebre - Punta del Fangar Carretera
description: Parking of the Vascos restaurant. No facilities. Trash available. Sea view and very quiet. Lots of mosquitoes! Recommended!

title: (43785) Bot - 1 Zn Diseminat
description: Place very close to town, Bot, with the amenities that this entails (bars, restaurants, pharmacy, shops, etc). The road is completely paved, although there is a steep incline until we reach the place where we will spend the night. It is very quiet, good views, and close to the Ermita de Sant Josep and El Forat de la Donzella.

title: (43860) Tarragona - 1P Lloc Urbanitzacio Rocas Doradas
description:
Ground parking near the beach where there is a sign to park motorhomes.
a little inclined and without any service.
There were cars parked in the area marked for motorhomes.

title: (43596) Horta de Sant Joan - 31 T-334
description: Camper and camping area of ecological payment with shadow zone Motorhomes maximum 6.50m and 3 high (bigger to try, power can enter, according to the possibility of the driver) Beware of the pothole to enter from the road to the driveway More info web services in photos or phone More karmell Owners language predominates English, Spanish 10 min walk to town with all services 2 min by car Under construction pergola, pool for dogs 2 Basin 2 sink and 2 showers basic but sufficient and clean Possibility of light but little power. It is solar. Abstain electrical appliances large consumption Ecological farm Shaded areas of almond trees short olive trees Good views of the mountain and quiet 100m from the greenway (route btt about 150km approx) Grass land floor Small pool to soak Bar service with prior notice

title: (43580) Deltebre - TV-3451
description: Place to land on the beach. Many mosquitoes

title: (43596) Horta de Sant Joan - Via Verda
title_short: (43596) Horta de Sant Joan - Via Verda
description: Estacio de Horta, games for children, along Via Verde. Very quiet

title: (43597) Arnes - 9 Zn Diseminats
description: To rest with beautiful views

name: Camping Alfacs
title: (43530) Camping Alfacs
description: Alcanar, 1 Carrer Mas del Cec. Camping alfacs drinking water and outlet on each location less than 5km from downtown sant carles de la rapita

title: (43597) Arnes - 40 Carrer Prat de la Riba
title_short: (43597) Arnes - 40 Carrer Prat de la Riba
description: New area near the soccer field and the pool. 5 minutes from the historic center of the village. Expand, quiet and tranquil. Second entrance to the Poble Venint d'Horta de Sant Joan.

title: (43597) Arnes - 40 Carrer Prat de la Riba
title_short: (43597) Arnes - 40 Carrer Prat de la Riba
description: Old soccer field enabled as parking for motorhomes. Lots of space, no services. (please avoid the nearby residential area..)

title: (43860) L'Ametlla de Mar - Partida Serramoca, 87
description:
Quiet, secure, fenced private parking space on a small yard between olive and carob trees, barbecue facilities available. Electricity and water are available. Sale of homemade olive oil.
Attention, be sure to register by phone or WhatsApp before arrival, otherwise access to the site is not possible.
Important, be sure to take the L'Ametlla de Mar exit to get to us.
Please note that we are private individuals and still have to master normal everyday life. If we can't answer you, maybe we have a lot to do, maybe we're working in the field and harvesting, or we just want to enjoy our wonderful peace and quiet.
We ask for your indulgence.
Registration from 09:00 - 17:00.
We speak Spanish, English and German.

title: (43513) - Riera del Comte
description: Nice place located in the source of the aiguadins, remote and quiet place in the middle of nature

name: Càmping Els Ports
title: (43597) Càmping Els Ports
description: 12 km from Arnes to Horta de Sant Joan Small family campsite. Perfect for coming with children: 2 swimming pools, small circuit bike, zip line, park and small car traffic. Quiet in August. At the back are sports facilities and a football pitch. Nice play area for children. Everything is new or well maintained.

title: (43597) Arnes - 17 Carrer Prat de la Riba
title_short: (43597) Arnes - 17 Carrer Prat de la Riba
description: Very quiet parking for the night, the streets to get there are wide, from here excursions to the Estrets and Toll del Vidre leave,

title: (43550) Ulldecona - 39 Carrer Sants Màrtirs
description: Automatic washing machines.

title: (43594) -
description: Parking lot without service but with a magnificent view at the Eremita Santa Maria Magdalena. Accessed by the road that leaves the C42 for Fontcalda. From this side road, a signposted gravel path leads up to the Eremita. Attention! The path is sometimes very steep and not suitable for large mobile homes. I got up well in the VW bus. You will be rewarded with a quiet, secluded place for the night.

title: (43580) Deltebre - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet place, on the beach, no service, no lighting.
